header.title: Lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso OHS
intro.title: Polokeho ea Kaho
intro.description: Netefatsa ho latela melao ea bophelo le polokeho ea kaho ka lisebelisoa tsa Salatiso OHS. Lisebelisoa tsa rona li u thusa ho laola likotsi, ho latela litlhoko tsa molao, le ho sireletsa basebetsi setšeng, ka ho sebelisa mekhoa e metle e hlalositsoeng ho "Polokeho Pele: Lintho tsa Bohlokoa tsa Merero ea OHS."
intro.download_link: Khoasolla Moralo oa OHS oa Kaho: Tobetsa Mona
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikarabello ba Moreki
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi ea Motheo (BRA) e hlalosang likotsi tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhaloso ea Bophelo & Polokeho e hlalosang litlhoko tse khethehileng tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(l): Amohela Moralo oa Bophelo & Polokeho oa Mokonteraka pele mosebetsi o qala.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikarabello ba Mokonteraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(a): Theha Moralo oa Bophelo & Polokeho o thehiloeng ho tlhaloso ea moreki.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ea Bophelo & Polokeho setšeng e nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Molao oa Kaho 9: Etsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi le Ho Hlahloba Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokhoa o khethehileng.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikarabello ba Setsebi sa H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Molao oa Kaho 5(5): Baemeli (PrCHSA) ba laola H&S molemong oa moreki, ba netefatsa ho latela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Molao oa Kaho 8(5): Liofisiri (CHSO) li thusa Bakonteraka ho kenya tšebetsong le ho beha leihlo litsamaiso tsa H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Melao ea SACPCMP: Ba tlameha ho boloka ngoliso le litlhoko tsa CPD bakeng sa maemo a setsebi.

resources.title: Ikopanye le Litsebi tsa H&S tse Amoheloang
resources.description: Na u hloka thuso ea setsebi? Ikopanye le litsebi tse amoheloang bakeng sa litlhoko tsa morero oa hau.

footer.newsletter.title: Lula U na le Lintlha
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Ho Latela ha OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Qala ka ho khetha tšebeletso ho netefatsa ho latela Molao oa Bophelo le Polokeho Mosebetsing.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Taba e Thabisang: Na u tseba hore litokomane tsa OHS tse nepahetseng li ka fokotsa liketsahalo tsa mosebetsi ka 30%? Ha re qaleng!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_1.description: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(b) o hloka Tlhaloso ea Bophelo le Polokeho bakeng sa merero eohle, ha 7(1)(b) e hloka Faele ea H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Taba e Thabisang: Tlhaloso e Matla ea H&S e ka fokotsa likotsi ka 30%! E tšoana le thebe ea polokeho ea morero oa hau.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_2.description: Molao oa Kaho 5: Bareki ba tlameha ho fana ka Tlhaloso ea Bophelo & Polokeho le ho netefatsa hore bakonteraka ba latela.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Taba e Thabisang: Bareki ba bolokang ngoliso ea COIDA ba ka qoba likotlo tse boima—boloka nomoro eo haufi!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_3.description: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(a): Bakonteraka ba tlameha ho theha Moralo oa Bophelo & Polokeho o thehiloeng ho tlhaloso ea moreki.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Taba e Thabisang: Ho khetha mokonteraka kapele ho ka potlakisa ho latela—mosebetsi oa sehlopha o etsa hore toro ea polokeho e sebetse!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_4.description: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(b): Bakonteraka ba tlameha ho boloka Faele ea Bophelo & Polokeho setšeng e nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Taba e Thabisang: Ho ba le lintlha tsa ho ikopanya tsa mokonteraka tse loketseng ho ka pholosa letsatsi nakong ea tšohanyetso—lula u hokahane!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_5.description: Molao oa Kaho 3(1): Tumello ea hlokahala bakeng sa merero e fetang R40,000 kapa e nkang matsatsi a fetang 180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Taba e Thabisang: Aterese tsa setša tse hlakileng li thusa litšebeletso tsa tšohanyetso ho u fumana kapele—se ke oa lumella phoso ea ho ngola ho sitisa thuso!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_6.description: Molao oa Kaho 9: Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi le ho Hlahloba Kotsi (HIRAs) ka mokhoa o khethehileng e hlokahala bakeng sa mesebetsi eohle.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Taba e Thabisang: Ho lemoha mesebetsi e kotsi kapele ho ka fokotsa likotsi ka 25%—e tšoana le ho fa morero oa hau matla a polokeho!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_7.description: Melao ea SACPCMP: CHSO le PrCHSA ba tlameha ho boloka ngoliso le litlhoko tsa CPD ho netefatsa ho latela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Taba e Thabisang: Setsebi sa SACPCMP se ngolisitsoeng se ka fokotsa likotsi tsa molao haholo—MVP ea polokeho ea morero oa hau!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Molao
sidebar.step_8.description: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(l): Bareki ba tlameha ho amohela moralo oa H&S oa mokonteraka pele mosebetsi o qala.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Taba e Thabisang: Boikarabello bo hlakileng litokomaneng bo ka eketsa pepenenego ea morero—motho e mong le e mong o tseba karolo ea hae!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Molao
sidebar.step_9.description: Molao oa Bophelo le Polokeho Mosebetsing: Litokomane tse nepahetseng li netefatsa ho latela le ho sireletsa bohle ba amehang.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Taba e Thabisang: Basket ea hau ke sesebelisoa sa hau sa polokeho—tokomane e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe eo u e eketsang e etsa hore morero oa hau o be le polokeho!
